versos: (razor) Isaiah 7:20 - "In that day the Lord will use a razor hired from beyond the Euphrates Riverthe king of Assyriato shave your head and private parts, and to cut off your beard also.";;;

(suddenly) 2 Kings 2:11 - "As they were walking along and talking together, suddenly a chariot of fire and horses of fire appeared and separated the two of them, and Elijah went up to heaven in a whirlwind.";;;
(charger) Mark 6:25: "And she came in straightway with haste unto the king, and asked, saying, I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist.";;;

(bowl) 2 Chronicles 4:5 - The center of the Sea stood twelve oxen, three facing north, three facing west, three facing south, and three facing east; and the sea was set on them above, and all their hindquarters were inward.;;;
(twelfth) 2 Chronicles 29:17 - "Therefore, the service of the house of the Lord was set in order.";;;

(bullocks) "Bring no more vain oblations; incense is an abomination unto me; the new moons and sabbaths, the calling of assemblies, I cannot away with; it is iniquity, even the solemn meeting." - Isaiah 1:13;;;
(waiting) Psalm 27:14 - "Wait for the Lord; be strong, and let your heart take courage; wait for the Lord";;;
(alarm) Joel 2:1 - Blow the trumpet in Zion; sound the alarm on my holy hill. Let all who live in the land tremble, for the day of the Lord is coming. It is close at hand.;;;
(rereward) Isaiah 52:12 - For ye shall not go out with haste, nor go by flight: for the Lord will go before you; and the God of Israel will be your rereward.;;;
(quenched) Ephesians 6:16 - "In addition to all this, take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one.";;;
(footmen) 2 Samuel 18:27 - "The watchman said, 'It seems to me that the first man runs like Ahimaaz son of Zadok.' 'Hes a good man,' the king said. 'He comes with good news.'";;;
(meek) Matthew 5:5 - "Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.";;;
(faithful) Proverbs 20:6 - "Many claim to have unfailing love, but a faithful person who can find";;;
(alas) Ezekiel 30:2 - "'alas The day For the day is near, the day of the LORD is near; it will be a day of clouds, a time of doom for the nations.";;;
